data.title: FC Barcelona received interest from a well-known brand to 'plant' Nike
data.meta_description: The income for the Barça are a priority from does already a time and this also includes the can generate the greater possible money with his T-shirt, even if necessary a change of mark
data.text:
Already it does some weeks explain in FCBN that some marks of sportive clothes had approached to the FC Barcelona to know if it is had to break the relation that has with Nike from does more than two decades. The Catalan club and the American mark have a valid agreement until 2028, signed in 2016 by the that then president of the Barça, Josep Maria Bartomeu, but from the Barcelona entity are not of the all satisfied.

In the dispatches culés explore all the formulas that can be possible to treat to increase his ordinary income and one of these roads that sige on the table is the one of the sponsorship of the T-shirt. That the idea continue valid also is due to that the Barça has received a new interest, as it has informed this Thursday 'Sport', which aims that beside the initial query of Cougar has arrived also New Balance.

The good news for the culés with regard to the interests produced in this closing of year is that so much Cougar like New Balance are two marks that are betting very strong by the football in the last two years. The first already 'fichó' to Neymar, whereas New Balance was until does very little with the Liverpool and now announced an agreement with Endrick, the forward fichado by the Real Madrid. Clubs of entity as I Carry or Lille also have joined to the quoted mark, although they also have lost other important names like Rome and Athletic Club.

The Barça has some questions that resolve with Nike

It remains clear equally that for the Barça would be very complicated to break a business little more than four years more with Nike, although yes that in the Barcelona club neither walk of the all satisfied with some situations associated to quality in some processes, designs or service to the players. Of equal way the information aims that from the American mark have a feeling seemed in by the occasions in which the team culé delays with some decisions or terms.
